body_html:
Provide sequence_lengths and it will reverse correctly, keeping padding on
the right.

On Jul 28, 2016 1:58 AM, "s4sarath" notifications@github.com wrote:

Hi , A small doubt . In Bi - directional RNN if the input is [ w1 , w2 ,
w3 , w4 , PAD , PAD ] , while its reversing internally , will it reverse
like [ PAD , PAD , w4 , w3 , w2 , w1 ] . The doubt is because , while
concatenating the forward hidden state and backward hidden state ( reversed
) , if the hidden state computes in the backward RNN is starting from left
to right , we will lose the information . ( hidden state fw(w1) + hidden
state bw(PAD) ) . This is not what we expect I guess . I have not seen the
implementation , just want to know if it is processing correctly or not .
